// Animaciones on scroll const observerOptions = { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px' };
const observer = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries) { entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { entry.target.classList.add('animated'); } }); }, observerOptions);
// Observar elementos con animación document.querySelectorAll('.copier-gallery-wrapper .animate-on-scroll').forEach(el => { observer.observe(el); });
